oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Marathon Films, Inc. Job No. 36608
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Invoice (No. 1155) for an order placed for Marathon Films, Inc. by Vic Lewis for 30 one color 9 x 4 1/2" posters that read "Nash" 30 one color 23 1/2 x 4 1/2" poster that read "Sounds" and 30 one color 12 x 4" posters that read "Tonight" on tag board. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.
